alert.note: Alert for Custer; Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:59PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Custer and northern Rosebud Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 855 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles west of Terry to 24 miles northeast of Colstrip. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. Localized street flooding has been reported in Miles City, as they received 1.75 inches of rain over the past hour. HAZARD...Half inch hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding, included flooded streets and small creek rises. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Angela, Hathaway, Moon Creek Ranch and Matthews Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
